name: Paramount Aviation Academy
about: Paramount Aviation Academy, located in Mahikeng, South Africa, is a premier flight training institution dedicated to producing top-notch aviators. We prioritize a safe environment, where staff and students vigilantly ensure the wellbeing of themselves and others. Our fleet is diverse, and the Mmabatho airfield offers a 4.5km asphalt runway, an active control tower, and a VOR, ideal for uninterrupted training. The North West province's favorable weather allows for year-round flying. Our highly experienced instructors provide personalized attention, ensuring students complete their studies efficiently. We offer various pilot training programs, including Private Pilot License, Commercial Pilot License, and Flight Instructor Rating. At Paramount Aviation Academy, we strive for safety, excellence, and precision in every aspect of aviation training.
services:
